original_text: until the day he was taken up to heaven, after giving instructions through the Holy Spirit to the apostles he had chosen.
korean_text: 그가 택하신 사도들에게 성령으로 명하시고 승천하신 날까지의 일을 기록하였노라

sentences.original_text: until the day he was taken up to heaven
after giving instructions through the Holy Spirit
to the apostles he had chosen
